description: Search and locate a shop by its full or partial name provided by the user, making it easy to quickly find the shop.
Start collecting all relevant details for the selected shop, including location, owner information, and other essential attributes.
Read, review, and verify the stored details of the current shop to ensure all collected information is accurate and complete.
Move to the next shop in the list to continue reviewing or collecting details in a sequential order efficiently.
Go back to the previous shop in the list for review or editing of previously entered shop details.
Find a product by its name, brand, category, or manufacturer details to quickly locate specific items in the database.
Move to the next product currently being viewed to continue reviewing or collecting additional product details.
Go back to the previous product being viewed for further review or editing of previously entered product details.
Add or edit the product name
Add or update the brand name of the product
Add or update the manufacturer information of the product to provide complete traceability of the item.
Add or modify the product category,
Enter product price accurately to reflect the current selling or collection price.
Add or update the product quantity, including package size or units available, to maintain correct inventory records.
Add any additional information like price of product and quantity or description about the product, such as special notes, features, or remarks.
